title: Free Update for Keyword Research Tool (Publisher Rocket A+ )

tactics.name: Identify Undersaturated Niches
tactics.description: Use BSR and review data to find low-competition categories with growth potential
steps: Analyze category averages for page count, review volume, and publication duration
Toggle between broad categories and deeper niches for targeted insights
Prioritize categories with declining monthly trends for entry opportunities
source_quotes: some of these that are under a hundred thousand BSR is scissor skills and they only have four reviews

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize for content creation
source_quotes: this one that has actual shoelaces and has over 1600 reviews I wouldn't necessarily try to make a book like that

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides perpetual updates with one-time purchase
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket is forever one fee for rubber so you pay it once

niche_patterns.example: kids activity books + low review count + cut and assemble
niche_patterns.description: Target specific DIY categories with minimal competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines tangible product creation with low saturation signals
